```{r setup, include=FALSE}
## Code was adapted from the Rmd file developed by Dr. Culbha Choudhary 
## for MAS scRNA-seq data
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(knitr, quietly = T)
library(kableExtra)
library(stringr)

maindir <-params$dir
```

# QC Analysis of sample: `r params$sample`

## Filtering  {.tabset .tabset-fade}

```{r  echo = F, results = 'asis'}
  img_list <- file.path(maindir,list.files(pattern = "seurat/*VlnPlot_[A-Z][a-z]+Filter.png$"))
  l <- img_list[rev(1:length(img_list))]
  title <- c("PreFilter", "PostFilter")
  for (i in c(1,2)){
      # j = gsub(".png", "", i)
      cat(paste("###", title[i], '\n', sep =' '))
      cat(paste('\n![](', l[i],')','{height=520px, width=520px}\n', sep = ''))
      cat("\n\n")
  }
```
<br><br><br>

## Cell Filter Thresholds {.tabset .tabset-fade}

### Cell Filter Threshold

```{r  echo=F ,results='asis'}
    data <- read.csv(paste(maindir, list.files(pattern = "seurat/FilterNumbers.csv$"), sep = '/'))
    kable(data, format='html') %>%
    column_spec(1:dim(data)[2], width = "5cm")
    cat("\n\n")
```
<br><br><br>

### Cell Filter Numbers
```{r  echo=F ,results='asis'}
    data1 <- read.csv(file.path(maindir,list.files(pattern = "seurat/FilterThresholds.csv$")))
    kable(data1, format='html') %>%
    column_spec(1:dim(data1)[2], width = "5cm")
    cat("\n\n")
```

## UMAP  {.tabset .tabset-fade}

```{r echo = F, results = 'asis'}

  img_list <- file.path(maindir,list.files(pattern ='seurat/*UMAPPlotwith[0-9]+PCs_0.[0-9].png$'))
  resolutions <- c(0.1, 0.3, 0.6, 0.8)
  for (i in (1:length(img_list))) {
      cat(paste("### Resolution", resolutions[i]))
      cat(paste('\n![](', img_list[i], ')','{height=520px, width=520px}\n', sep = ''))
      cat("\n")
  }
```
<br><br><br>
